HotelElement.Name: Tryp By Wyndham Bremen Airport (formerly Mercure Hanseatic)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at TRYP by Wyndham Bremen Airport in Bremen, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Beck's Brewery and Bremen City Hall. This hotel is within close proximity of Paula Modersohn Becker Museum and Marktplatz.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 183 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of TRYP by Wyndham Bremen Airport. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Bremen? This hotel has facilities measuring 1851 square feet (172 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon

Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for TRYP by Wyndham Bremen Airport is Bremen (BRE) - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
